text: She hinted earlier in the week that she had moved in with fiance Pete Davidson. And Ariana Grande seemed to be getting a start on making their apartment feel like home on Monday. Seen around New York City together, the 24 - year - olds were spotted furniture shopping and getting tattoos together. Moving in! Engaged Ariana Grande and Pete Davidson headed out for new tattoos and went furniture shopping for their NY apartment on Monday Taking to Instagram Stories, Ariana showcased the new ink on her right hand below her thumb.'H2GKMO,'reads the tattoo. The letters and number are an acronym for :'Honest To God Knock Me Out'- a phrase the songstress has tweeted out several times recently.'H2GKMO': Ariana and a friend
